abstract: Tenet says an all-cash bid from Community Health Systems still “grossly undervalues” the company, pointing to a rise in valuations for hospital operators.
snippet: Tenet says an all-cash bid from Community Health Systems still “grossly undervalues” the company, pointing to a rise in valuations for hospital operators.
lead_paragraph: 1:52 p.m. | Updated Tenet Healthcare said on Friday that its board had rejected a revised $3.3 billion takeover offer from Community Health Systems.

headline.main: Tenet Rejects Community Health’s Revised Bid
